comment.author: 49276748@N00
comment._content:
I never realised strobing was as developed so long ago as this terrific example demonstrates.

In the digital age it is fairly easy to control and set up,but to produce something so sublime on the blind is jawdroping.

Well done Mr Alfred T. Palmer. You are/were a master. How come you don't have copyright on your photo though?
